original: 2.6 Counterparts . This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts with the same effect as if all signatory parties had signed the same document. All counterparts shall be construed together and shall constitute one and the same instrument. Delivery of an executed signature page of this Agreement by facsimile transmission or in portable document format (.pdf) shall be effective as delivery of a manually executed counterpart hereof.
ollama_generated: 2.6 Multiple Executions . This Agreement can be signed separately by each party, with each separate signature serving equally binding effect. These individual signatures collectively form part of a single and indivisible document. Transmission of an electronically signed page of this Agreement (via email or digital platforms) shall be considered equivalent to physically signed counterparts. However, it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure the authenticity and validity of such electronic signature prior to entering into any obligations under this Agreement.
